subject: Baseball
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: A durable third baseman in the American League, Mr. Yost had a penchant for garnering bases on balls. He was also a coach on the Mets’ 1969 World Series team.
snippet: A durable third baseman in the American League, Mr. Yost had a penchant for garnering bases on balls. He was also a coach on the Mets’ 1969 World Series team.
